mapper.insert: insert into calendar(id,title,cdate,ctime,num,color,dday) values(#{id},#{title}, to_date(#{date},'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, calendar_seq.nextval, #{color}, #{dday})
mapper.select: select c.*, to_Char(c.cdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') CC, to_date(to_char(sysdate)) - cdate DD from calendar c where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update calendar set title=#{title}, cdate=#{date}, ctime=#{time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color=#{color}, dday=#{dday} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select c.*, to_Char(c.cdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') CC, to_date(to_char(sysdate)) - cdate DD from calendar c where id=#{id} and dday='true' order by cdate ) where rownum <=3 and dd < 0
